field.label: Enable request mode
field.help: Enable this feature if you want to apply ICAPeg in Request mode

field.label: Enable response mode
field.help: Enable this feature if you want to apply ICAPeg in Response mode

field.label: clamav_process_extensions
field.help: Choose for which Options. Everything except the ones in bypass, unknown = system couldn't find out the type of the file

field.label: clamav_reject_extensions
field.help: Choose for which Options. Everything except the ones in bypass, unknown = system couldn't find out the type of the file

field.label: clamav_bypass_extensions
field.help: Choose for which Options. Everything except the ones in bypass, unknown = system couldn't find out the type of the file

field.label: Timeout
field.help: Time in seconds,the time upto which the server will wait for clamav to scan the results

field.label: Enable shadow service
field.help: Enable this feature if you want to add debugging headers to ICAPeg-Shadow-Service

field.label: Preview enabled
field.help: Enable this feature if you want to enable Preview bytes on files

field.label: Return original
field.help: Enable this feature if you want to return original if max file size exceeded

field.label: Return 400
field.help: Enable this feature if you want to return 400 if file extention rejected
